name: inventory-management-system
description: AI-powered inventory management system with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'Backend linting not configured'
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && npm run test || echo 'Frontend tests not configured'
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build && npm run deploy:copy
scripts.deploy:copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -r frontend/dist/* dist/ && cp -r backend/src dist/api
